intent_atoms.description: BoxParserRegistry must have dedicated entries for new codec payload boxes when fixtures arrive.
Execute macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark using R4 protocol once hardware runners are available.
Benchmark execution must be scheduled and tracked in the specified documentation.
Release readiness steps (DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export, QA) require macOS infrastructure before completion.
Run random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.
Benchmark must be executed once Combine support is available and results documented.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS with XCTest UI to validate SwiftUI automation flow.
Testing entitlements for macOS UI testing are unavailable in the container.
Execute Combine-backed UI benchmark on macmacOS to capture latency metrics.

functional_units.name: mvhd Movie Header Parser
functional_units.description: Parses the 'mvhd' movie header box into a detail struct and exposes its data via tests and documentation.

functional_units.name: BoxParserRegistry Codec Payload Monitoring
functional_units.description: Monitors incoming codec payloads (e.g., Dolby Vision boxes) and registers dedicated parser entries when new fixtures arrive.

functional_units.name: Handler Type Categorization Evaluation
functional_units.description: Evaluates additional handler type categorizations for future boxes beyond current mapping set.

functional_units.name: macOS CLI/UI Large-File Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Executes large-file performance benchmarks on macOS using the R4 protocol via CLI or UI.

functional_units.name: Release Readiness Validation Workflow
functional_units.description: Runs macOS DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export and hardware QA to validate release readiness.

functional_units.name: Random Slice Benchmark Suite Execution
functional_units.description: Runs random slice benchmark suite on macOS to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests
functional_units.description: Automates end‑to‑end SwiftUI parsing tree streaming selection flow using XCTest UI on macOS.

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI Benchmark
functional_units.description: Captures latency metrics for Combine‑based UI benchmark on macOS, maintaining CLI throughput parity.

functional_units.name: JSON Export Snapshot Tests
functional_units.description: Provides snapshot tests for JSON export functionality, ensuring consistent output across versions.

functional_units.name: Codec Metadata Extraction
functional_units.description: Extracts and verifies codec metadata from stsd boxes.
